sentences.sContent: Socrates's famous aphorism "the unexamined life is not worth living" was, by the time of his trial, clearly beginning to jar.
sentences.sContent_eng: Socrates's famous aphorism "the unexamined life is not worth living" was, by the time of his trial, clearly beginning to jar.
sentences.sCn: 苏格拉底的名言“未经审视的生活是豪无价值的”，从他被审判时开始，明显开始动摇了。

remMethod.val: a + phor(带来) + ism → 带来智慧的话 → 格言

words.tran: 用格言或警句说话、写作

trans.tranOther: a short phrase that contains a wise idea
